Edit a Deck using valid payload

00:00:06
Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {
    “id”: 2,
    “name”: “API Testing3”
    },
    “book”: {
    “bookTitle”: “Automation3”,
    “bookAuthor”: “Osanda Nimalarathna”,
    “chapter”: “Chap. 04”
    },
    “purchaseInformation”: {
    “purchasedDate”: 1512021142001,
    “price”: 777,
    “sku”: “com.pearson.smartflashcards.test3”
    },
    “notificationSettings”: {
    “areNotificationsEnabled”: true,
    “notificationTime”: “08:00 AM”,
    “notificationFrequency”: “5”
    },
    “categoryId”: “5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba”,
    “examDate”: 1512021142000,
    “userId”: “34”,
    “parentDeckId”: “5”,
    “tempDeckId”: “999”,
    “archived”: true,
    “cardPreview”: true,
    “noOfCards”: 2,
    “progress”: 3,
    “downloads”: 12,
    “deckAuthor”: “Osanda”,
    “deckAuthorId”: “6”,
    “thumbnailUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • When the user invokes the API

    Successfully read the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\MaxSoft-ATA-Framework\resources/access_tokens/saved_valid_access_token.txt”

    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Edit a Deck using valid payload

00:00:05
Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {
    “id”: 2,
    “name”: “API Testing3”
    },
    “book”: {

    “areNotificationsEnabled”: true,
    “notificationTime”: “08:00 AM”,
    “notificationFrequency”: “5”
    },

    “starred”: true
    }

    “categoryId”: “5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba”,

00:00:05
Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {

    “starred”: true
    }

    “updatedAt”: “2018-03-10T16:53:25.268Z”,
    “archived”: true,
    “cardPreview”: true,
    “noOfCards”: 2,
    “progress”: 3,
    “downloads”: 12,
    “deckAuthor”: “Osanda”,
    “deckAuthorId”: “6”,
    “thumbnailUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true,
    “userDeck”: true,
    “expert”: false
    }

    Response Headers are:
    X-Application-Context=application:8080
    Content-Type=application/json;charset=UTF-8
    Transfer-Encoding=chunked
    Date=Sat, 10 Mar 2018 16:53:25 GMT

Execution Time : 00:00:00

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.title56575
    $.descriptionTest description for API Deck3
    $.tags[0]API tag1
    $.book.bookTitleAutomation3
    $.book.bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:

    “title”: “API Deck3”,

  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.titleAPI Deck3
    $.description6687678
    $.tags[0]API tag1
    $.book.bookTitleAutomation3
    $.book.bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    $.book.chapterChap. 04
    $.notificationSettings.areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    $.notificationSettings.notificationTime08:00
    $.notificationSettings.notificationFrequency1
    $.examDate1512021142000
    $.userId34
    $.parentDeckId5
    $.archivedtrue
    $.cardPreviewtrue
    $.noOfCards2
    $.progress3
    $.downloads12
    $.deckAuthorOsanda
    $.deckAuthorId6
    $.thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    $.statusClosed
    $.expertfalse
    $.purchaseInfo.price0
    $.starredtrue
    $.categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

Edit a Deck using valid payload

00:00:05
Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {
    “id”: 2,
    “name”: “API Testing3”
    },
    “book”: {
    “bookTitle”: “Automation3”,
    “bookAuthor”: “Osanda Nimalarathna”,
    “chapter”: “Chap. 04”
    },
    “purchaseInformation”: {
    “purchasedDate”: 1512021142001,
    “price”: 777,
    “sku”: “com.pearson.smartflashcards.test3”
    },
    “notificationSettings”: {
    “areNotificationsEnabled”: true,
    “notificationTime”: “08:00 AM”,
    “notificationFrequency”: “5”
    },
    “categoryId”: “5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba”,
    “examDate”: 1512021142000,
    “userId”: “34”,
    “parentDeckId”: “5”,
    “tempDeckId”: “999”,
    “archived”: true,
    “cardPreview”: true,
    “noOfCards”: 2,
    “progress”: 3,
    “downloads”: 12,
    “deckAuthor”: “Osanda”,
    “deckAuthorId”: “6”,
    “thumbnailUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • When the user invokes the API

    Successfully read the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\MaxSoft-ATA-Framework\resources/access_tokens/saved_valid_access_token.txt”

    $.purchaseInfo.price0

    $.categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

Edit a Deck using valid payload

00:00:05
Execution Time : 00:00:03
  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {

    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true
    }

    “userDeck”: true,

    “thumbnailUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true,
    “userDeck”: true,
    “expert”: false
    }

    Response Headers are:
    X-Application-Context=application:8080
    Content-Type=application/json;charset=UTF-8
    Transfer-Encoding=chunked
    Date=Sat, 10 Mar 2018 16:55:29 GMT

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "201"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And save the JSON Path values in the response inside the data stores
    DataStore TypeVariable NameValue To Be Stored
    scenariodeckId$.id

    “5aa40e0138ade73b6e89aae8” is successfully saved as a text in Scenario Data Store [deckId]

    “5aa40e0c38ade73b6e89aaea” is successfully saved as a text in Scenario Data Store [deckId]

    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set

    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3

    #bookChapterChap. 04

    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6

    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3

    #starredtrue

00:00:04

  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

Edit a Deck using valid payload

00:00:04
Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {
    “id”: 2,
    “name”: “API Testing3”
    },
    “book”: {
    “bookTitle”: “Automation3”,
    “bookAuthor”: “Osanda Nimalarathna”,
    “chapter”: “Chap. 04”
    },
    “purchaseInformation”: {
    “purchasedDate”: 1512021142001,
    “price”: 777,
    “sku”: “com.pearson.smartflashcards.test3”
    },
    “notificationSettings”: {
    “areNotificationsEnabled”: true,
    “notificationTime”: “08:00 AM”,
    “notificationFrequency”: “5”
    },
    “categoryId”: “5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba”,
    “examDate”: 1512021142000,
    “userId”: “34”,
    “parentDeckId”: “5”,
    “tempDeckId”: “999”,
    “archived”: true,
    “cardPreview”: true,
    “noOfCards”: 2,
    “progress”: 3,
    “downloads”: 12,
    “deckAuthor”: “Osanda”,
    “deckAuthorId”: “6”,
    “thumbnailUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true
    }

Edit a Deck using valid payload

00:00:04
Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {
    “id”: 2,
    “name”: “API Testing3”
    },
    “book”: {

    “starred”: true

Edit a Deck using valid payload

00:00:04
Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {
    “id”: 2,

    “bookAuthor”: “Osanda Nimalarathna”,
    “chapter”: “Chap. 04”
    },
    “purchaseInfo”: {
    “price”: 0
    },
    “notificationSettings”: {

    “notificationTime”: “08:00”,
    “notificationFrequency”: “3”
    },
    “epochTime”: {

    “updatedAt”: 1520701004381
    },
    “examReminder”: {

    },
    “examDate”: 1512021142000,
    “userId”: “34”,
    “parentDeckId”: “5”,
    “tempDeckId”: “999”,
    “createdAt”: “2018-03-10T16:56:42.234Z”,
    “updatedAt”: “2018-03-10T16:56:44.382Z”,
    “archived”: true,
    “cardPreview”: true,
    “noOfCards”: 2,
    “progress”: 3,
    “downloads”: 12,
    “deckAuthor”: “Osanda”,
    “deckAuthorId”: “osa”,

    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true,
    “userDeck”: true,
    “expert”: false
    }

    Response Headers are:
    X-Application-Context=application:8080
    Content-Type=application/json;charset=UTF-8
    Transfer-Encoding=chunked
    Date=Sat, 10 Mar 2018 16:56:44 GMT

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "200"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.titleAPI Deck3
    $.descriptionTest description for API Deck3
    $.tags[0]API tag1
    $.book.bookTitleAutomation3
    $.book.bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    $.book.chapterChap. 04

    $.progress3
    $.downloads12

    $.expertfalse
    $.purchaseInfo.price0
    $.starredtrue
    $.categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

Edit a Deck using valid payload

00:00:04
Execution Time : 00:00:02
  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {
    “id”: 2,
    “name”: “API Testing3”
    },
    “book”: {

    “purchaseInformation”: {

    “price”: 777,

    “areNotificationsEnabled”: true,
    “notificationTime”: “08:00 AM”,
    “notificationFrequency”: “5”
    },
    “categoryId”: “5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba”,

    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true
    }

    “updatedAt”: “2018-03-10T16:56:55.539Z”,
    “archived”: true,
    “cardPreview”: true,
    “noOfCards”: 2,
    “progress”: 3,
    “downloads”: 12,
    “deckAuthor”: “Osanda”,
    “deckAuthorId”: “12.2”,
    “thumbnailUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true,
    “userDeck”: true,
    “expert”: false
    }

    Response Headers are:
    X-Application-Context=application:8080
    Content-Type=application/json;charset=UTF-8
    Transfer-Encoding=chunked
    Date=Sat, 10 Mar 2018 16:56:55 GMT

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "200"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.titleAPI Deck3
    $.descriptionTest description for API Deck3
    $.tags[0]API tag1
    $.book.bookTitleAutomation3
    $.book.bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    $.book.chapterChap. 04
    $.notificationSettings.areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    $.notificationSettings.notificationTime08:00
    $.notificationSettings.notificationFrequency3
    $.examDate1512021142000
    $.userId34
    $.parentDeckId5
    $.archivedtrue
    $.cardPreviewtrue
    $.noOfCards2
    $.progress3
    $.downloads12
    $.deckAuthorOsanda
    $.deckAuthorId12.2
    $.thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    $.statusClosed
    $.expertfalse
    $.purchaseInfo.price0
    $.starredtrue
    $.categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

00:00:05

  • Create a deck
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create a Deck using Deck Service"

    API Endpoint is:
    https://deckapi.stg-prsn.com/api/decks

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    ConfigurationConfiguration Value
    Is authentication required?Yes
    Do you need to retrieve the access token from the text file?Yes
    Provide the access token if you need to authorize the API manuallyN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #titleAPI Deck3
    #descriptiontest description
    #tags1API tag1
    #subjectId2
    #subjectNameAPI Testing3
    #bookTitleAutomation3
    #bookAuthorOsanda Nimalarathna
    #bookChapterChap. 04
    #purchasedDate1512021142001
    #purchaseInformationPrice777
    #purchaseInformationskucom.pearson.smartflashcards.test3
    #areNotificationsEnabledtrue
    #notificationTime08:00 AM
    #notificationFrequency5
    #examDate1512021142000
    #userId34
    #parentDeckId5
    #tempDeckId999
    #archivedtrue
    #cardPreviewtrue
    #noOfCards2
    #progress3
    #downloads12
    #deckAuthorNameOsanda
    #deckAuthorId6
    #thumbnailUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a154f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #statusClosed
    #starredtrue
    #categoryId5a5db30a12ef181b0af109ba

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “title”: “API Deck3”,
    “description”: “test description”,
    “tags”: [
    “API tag1”
    ],
    “subject”: {

    },

    “status”: “Closed”,
    “starred”: true
    }
